Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
The utxo selection for CC contracts is not designed for spamming the crap out of it on multiple nodes at once... I changed all of it though today to amke it easier to test. 
For entropy it wont let you send, unless the total is over 100, but thousands is even better, then it chooses randomly one of them. 
For local wallet I did same algo, but it checks if you have over 200 utxo in your wallet before applying random filter... ended up removing this though as I expect it to cause issues for peopel who dont understand utxo's ...

Author: idrtis#7552
Content: i think it would have been better to make the dice rigged to give a chance of winning the game 50.001% or something minimally higher . Hodlers, miners would understand that in the long run they would lose in relative terms, everyone would gamble it would become a wild west shit show.

Author: idrtis#7552
Content: people would write bots to gamble in small amounts to make the winning edge appear. normal people would see this and rush to gamble before bot herds are able to accumulate

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you can get 50% chance with odds of 1

Author: idrtis#7552
Content: i am saying game theory would be more interesting. Dont get me wrong, it is still fun.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: house having 0% edge is unique

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and the highest sustainable payout

Author: idrtis#7552
Content: i am talking about house having negative edge. because no one has the keys or access to those funds it wouldnt matter. And it would incentivize people to gamble like crazy

Content: negative edge will run out at some point

Author: idrtis#7552
Content: yeah. when it looks like runing out maybe direct % of block reward to house fund or make a coin swap to another blockchain game

Author: idrtis#7552
